meanings.definition: A flat-bottomed pan used for frying food.
meanings.sent1: I cooked eggs in the frypan for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: The frypan sizzled as the bacon cooked.
meanings.sent3: The frypan and spatula danced together in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a frypan of ideas, sizzling and ready to serve.
meanings.sent5: The frypan gleamed under the kitchen lights, promising a delicious meal.

meanings.definition: To cook food in a frypan.
meanings.sent1: Mom will frypan the chicken for dinner tonight.
meanings.sent2: I always frypan vegetables with olive oil.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to frypan the dessert, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: His words frypaned her heart, leaving a bittersweet taste.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of spices frypanning in the kitchen filled the house with warmth.
